snippet: Campus cards are the subject of a report by the Government Accountability Office, which recommends tougher regulations to make sure students get a fair deal.
lead_paragraph: Campus cards are the subject of a report by the Government Accountability Office, which recommends tougher regulations to make sure students get a fair deal.

headline.main: Checking the Fairness of College-Provided Debit Cards
